channel.title: How to edit the startup logo of client?(not loading logo)
channel.description:
Hello again!
I want to trouble you with one problem - how to edit the background logo you see, when you try to login ? That one: [img]http://img379.imageshack.us/img379/2541/rscdhd1.png[/img]
And not the LOADING logo!
Thanks in advance! Waiting for response.

item.title: How to edit the startup logo of client?(not loading logo)
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

you didnt answer my question in pm and it was valid. nobody has ever asked it before, and it wasnt simple either but you ignored it anyways and didnt offer me any help whatsoever.

Answered.

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit the startup logo of client?(not loading logo)

item.title: How to edit the startup logo of client?(not loading logo)
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:11, topic:221972”]My skills are not going to waste, they impress me and get what i need done. People don’t become programmers to impress others. I’ll help people like they helped me if they ask a valid RSC Server Development question. But right now these threads have been answered a million times and they are not progressing any further except throwing another useless server out there for more players to split up into. By useless i mean a server where someone needs to ask for help for a simple thing, yeh its all fun and games to them except it’s wrecking the rsc world and right now it cant even be fixed.

Nobody here is willing to learn properly and give things a shot. Take a look at the last 100-200 threads on here and you will see that nobody has tried to do something java/development-wise and actually gave something a shot without requesting the entire thing done.[/quote]you didnt answer my question in pm and it was valid. nobody has ever asked it before, and it wasnt simple either but you ignored it anyways and didnt offer me any help whatsoever.

[quote=“infinative, post:20, topic:221972”][quote author=mubby link=topic=291507.msg2351221#msg2351221 date=1216986550]

would of done it for free [/quote]
So what is the problem then?

xEnt, true that this community is full of cocky newcomers and leechers, but maybe you could make some difference. Or, just make programs that people could use, then there would be some use of you. Otherwise, your skills are really going to waste if you don’t use them.

the problem is that u scammed for no reason. to me its a scam because u didnt send any money, but if it was for free nothing would of happened, thats what the problem is u idiot, couldnt u work that out urself instead of asking stupid questionz?

You sent your PM with MSN before I offered cash, therefore that offer wasn’t for you. And if you would have done it for free and you did, then what you cry about?

Oh, and you didn’t help me with THIS issue. ;)[/quote]sorry but thats bullshit, you promised cash and you didnt deliver on your promise. therefore you lied.

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit the startup logo of client?(not loading logo)

item.title: How to edit the startup logo of client?(not loading logo)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“BuyMyJunk, post:17, topic:221972”][quote author=infinative link=topic=291507.msg2350862#msg2350862 date=1216967798]

let me refer you to one of xEnt’s greatest posts ever
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,290476.msg2342701.html#msg2342701, that there is his help toward newcomers use it

99.9% of all the questions that are even asked in rsc dev anymore have been answer hundreds of times before, yet none of you ever use the search button
dont say your used it because you didnt it took me 2sec to find a topic explaining on how to do it, look though the entire topic and maybe the answer is there

What the…? I used search even before when I made this thread. And this took me nowhere. -.-
[/quote]

then you didnt use it correctly, i found what you looked for with no problem you should be able to do the same[/quote]
I found long ago some “packer/unpacker” but this isn’t for editing *.rscd files and to pack sprites all together. It’s just to convert *.png to *.spr and vice versa.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 25, 2008, 03:12:12 am[/size][hr][quote=“Aj-`, post:16, topic:221972”][quote author=mubby link=topic=291507.msg2349806#msg2349806 date=1216897525]
fuck this guy, i helped him with the other stuff he wanted, promised me some cash, and blocks me, i would of done it for free but he offered me some money so i said yeh and runs away, he dont deserve help.

[/quote]
Lol I rest my case about you infinative, you are the weakest link.[/quote]

Lol.

mubby:

would of done it for free

Pwnd, Aj, seems like YOU are the weakest link.

Read full topic

item.title: How to edit the startup logo of client?(not loading logo)
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

This is not development. Not only has it been answered a million times in other posts, this has nothing to do with development. Setting up a source/finding things is really nothing to do with developing.

Anyway I’ve never used custom sprites or tried to make any of my own so im not sure where for you to look, but i’d assume its in the sprite files so you need to export/edit/repack and use the new sprite files (iirc that was how it was done)

Read full topic
